pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, May 14, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Managing Director of the International Monetary Fund, Kristalina Georgieva.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Registered Nurses’ Association of Ontario (RNAO), as part of National Nursing Week. The visit is part of an annual invitation from RNAO to elected officials, which allows them to see first-hand the important work nurses are doing.

Closed to media.

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians on the COVID-19 situation, and a media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 10:45 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-960-7527
    Toll-free: 1-888-265-0903
    Pass code: 3418355#
